attributes.action: stop chewing gum during Prime Minister's Questions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Am I alone in being horrified by the sight of the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland standing at the ballot box with his jaws working away furiously chewing gum?

The sight of Mr Brown masticating at the ballot box not only makes him look nauseatingly common, but serves also to insult and demean the institution of Parliament.

Would William Gladstone have popped in a stick of Juicy Fruit prior to addressing the house? I think not.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
